item.title: The Plucky Squire: How Long to Beat & How Many Chapters?
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How Long to Beat The Plucky Squire
  • How Many Chapters Are in The Plucky Squire?

The Plucky Squire is not a game for those who want a massive-scale game filled with side quests, secret unlockable weapons, and multiple endings, as it's a very straightforward and linear game; a style that it handles incredibly well. Players will be delighted by the articulate narration that will guide them from page to page, and different parts of the game are separated through different chapters .

However, the time to beat the game does fluctuate depending on the goal of the player. Some players will want to breeze through the game, some will explore every inch of the map, and others may find themselves struggling in a minigame for far longer than they’d like to admit — but feel a large sense of accomplishment after.

How Long to Beat The Plucky Squire

Games come in a wide array of complexities, and some can take hundreds of hours to accomplish everything they have to offer. However, The Plucky Squire is a linear game with a narrated story. While there are some hidden paths and collectibles, players going through the story will only find it takes them about 7 hours to reach the credits. Those who explore every corner and take in the world will see this increase closer to 8 hours . Lastly, players who have trouble with puzzles and boss fight mini-games can expect this to add even more time to the game.

Achievement/Trophy Hunting

For players who plan on doing everything the game has to offer and getting their hands on every achievement/trophy, this timeframe can jump up. Having a guide for getting all the achievements/trophies in the game can bump this up by another hour . However, those that complete the game without collecting everything may need to replay the entire game again .

How Many Chapters Are in The Plucky Squire?

Below is a list of how many chapters are in the game , along with each of its titles. Each chapter is a self-contained segment of the story, meaning players will not be able to go all the way back to the events of the first chapter after progressing deep into the story.

  • Chapter 1 – Some Serious Beeswax
  • Chapter 2 – Tome Tower
  • Chapter 3 – Moonbeard
  • Chapter 4 – A Treacherous Trail
  • Chapter 5 – Artia
  • Chapter 6 – Very Metal
  • Chapter 7 – Beach Battle Boogie
  • Chapter 8 – Clash at the Castle
  • Chapter 9 – The Magnificent Humgrump
  • Chapter 10 – A Great Inspiration

item.title: Why the Return of Backyard Sports Games is Perfectly Timed
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • The Backyard Sports franchise that was popular in the late 90s and 2000s is officially returning after the series went on a hiatus following its decline in 2015.
  • This sports games revival is perfectly timed, as a recent run of stellar sports titles makes 2024 the ideal environment for the return of Backyard Sports.
  • A new generation of sports fans can be introduced to the franchise through modern games following the relaunch, making it beneficial for a younger audience.

The Backyard Sports franchise is officially returning after an extensive absence from mainline gaming. Backyard Sports kicked off with the release of Backyard Baseball in 1997, before spawning Backyard Football , Backyard Hockey , Backyard Soccer , and more on PC and consoles. Unfortunately, later entries saw a massive decline, with the simultaneous release of mobile-only titles Backyard Sports: Basketball 2015 and Backyard Sports: Baseball 2015 putting the final nail in the coffin. With its official revival announcement in August 2024, the series seeks to make an impact on a new generation of gamers. Luckily for fans, the return of Backyard Sports is perfectly timed.

The Backyard Sports games, particularly the original Backyard Baseball , were hugely popular in the late 1990s and early 2000s. Boasting a range of highly memorable characters and welcoming mechanics, the series offered young gamers an accessible entrance into both sports and gaming, respectively. When the series switched hands, many of its biggest fans were too old to play, leading later entries to experiment with new ways to connect with a younger generation. This plan did not work out, leading to a sharp and sudden decline in sales and quality that spelled the series’ end in 2015. However, sports games have seen a massive resurgence in recent years, and older fans, including former NFL star Jason Kelce, have been especially vocal about seeing Backyard Sports return. With last month’s announcement of an official reboot, that return is official, and the timing is sweet as candy.

Backyard Sports is Returning at a High Point for Sports Games

2024 has been an unusually great year for sports games. WWE 2K24 lets players step into the ring as the referee, warning competitors and setting the count during spectacular beatdowns. NBA 2K24: Kobe Bryant Edition honored the legacy of an NBA great, allowing players to recreate some of Bryant’s most memorable moments. Most significantly, EA Sports College Football 25 brought college football back to gaming after more than a decade-long absence, selling over 2.2 million early access Deluxe Edition copies. With the stage set, and sports games fans already enjoying an outstanding slate of titles, now is a great time for a fan-favorite non-licensed sports game to take a swing at making a comeback.

While Backyard Sports was only just announced in August 2024, its reveal is already among the best sports game news stories of the year. It’s been quite a while since the golden era of non-licensed sports games, and players who grew up with them are undoubtedly excited to share their unique style with their own children. It remains to be seen what the new era of Backyard Sports will entail. However, the announcement’s visual aesthetic and reintroduction of fan-favorite characters have fans anticipating a return to form.

Backyard Sports’ Return Caters to a New Generation of Sports Fans

The Backyard Sports franchise was hugely popular among millennials and acted as many players’ first sports games. The titles offered kids an accessible way to learn the basic rules of major sports and foster an interest in playing, themselves. Just as significantly, Backyard Baseball opened the door for sports fans of all ages to discover video games and foster their fandom in a new and interactive way, playing as everyday kids like themselves. With its revival, current IP holder Playground Productions hopes to inspire a new generation of sports fans to explore their interests in both sports and entertainment. To accomplish this goal, Backyard Sports ' newest iteration will offer more than just a rebooted game offering.

While Backyard Sports' official announcement sent shockwaves through the gaming community, video games aren’t the only place fans can expect to see their favorite players. Playground Productions has announced that it will reintroduce Backyard Sports ’ iconic roster of child-athletes through games, TV, film, and other media, making the franchise reboot a multimedia event. It is currently unknown how or when the rebooted Backyard Sports will make its first appearance. Until more Playground Productions shares more, fans of Backyard Sports fans eagerly anticipate the return of Pablo Sanchez, Kiesha Phillips, and the rest of the Background Kids.

item.title: Fortnite: Chapter 5 Season 4 Forecast Towers Locations
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Forecast Tower Locations in Fortnite
  • How to Secure Forecast Towers in Fortnite

The storm has always been an important mechanic in Fortnite . In this Battle Royale, the Storm Circle closes in as the match proceeds in order to bring the remaining players closer and closer to one another and see who gets the Victory Royale.

In the past, there have been several ways for players to get some insight on upcoming Storm Circles, as this is a useful advantage that many players enjoy having. In Chapter 5 Season 4, gamers can secure Forecast Tower locations and get hints on the upcoming Storm Circle - a great advantage to have in the end game. This guide tells gamers where they can find Forecast Towers in Fortnite .

Forecast Tower Locations in Fortnite

In previous season, there were four possible spawn locations for Forecast Towers, and only three of them would appear per match. In Chapter 5 Season 4, there are only two Forecast Towers in Fortnite , and here is where players will find them:

  • On northern side of the mountain north of Sandy Steppes and east of Reclaimed Villa
  • On the hill north of Dumpenhausen, south of Reckless Railways

In Chapter 5 Season 4, since there are only two towers, both of them will spawn every match. However, gamers might want to shield up and find good weapons before heading up there; they appear relatively early on into the match so several other players might have the idea to secure the same Forecast Tower.

How to Secure Forecast Towers in Fortnite

Forecast Towers have three stages, and since they're connected, they change according to the Storm Circle. When the match starts, the Forecast Tower computer will have a message saying "Awaiting Forecast," which means it's not ready to be used yet, and there's nothing gamers can do to interact with it.

Once there's 50 seconds until the first Storm Circle starts closing, the message will change to "Acquiring Forecast" . At first, it'll be at zero percent, and it will increases every second. It will reach 100 percent when they're precisely one minute left until second Storm Circle starts closing .

At this point, the forecast will be ready to be secured and three Latverian grunts will spawn. The mini-boss is bigger than the two henchmen that walk beside him and gamers must take him out to get the Forecast Tower Access Card .

Although gamers aren't required to take down the weaker Latverian Grunts, they definitely should to prevent them from attacking them.

Once gamers have defeated the mini-boss, it will drop the Forecast Tower Acess Card, which they must then bring to Forecast Tower computer to secure the forecast and always have access to the location of the next Storm Circle .

Besides the Forecast Tower Access Card, the Latverian mini-boss will also drop a Epic-Rarity Striker Burst Rifle, a Medkit, and a shield potion.

Here is a video demonstrating how to secure a Forecast Tower in Fortnite :

item.title: Logitech Reveals New Line of Video Game Steering Wheels
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Logitech G RS is a new line of steering wheels for PC and console, including a MOMO partnership.
  • Logitech dominates the premium racing accessories market with G Pro wheel.
  • The Logitech G RS lineup offers new racing wheel designs and starts shipping on October 13, 202

Hardware manufacturer Logitech has announced Logitech G RS, a brand-new line of PC and console steering wheels for use with racing games and automotive sims. The new Logitech line also incorporates a partnership with Italian automotive design firm MOMO.

Though many players know Logitech more for peripherals like headphones, keyboards, and mice, the company makes hardware and accessories for a range of game genres and activities, including racing. In fact, Logitech racing wheels are among the best gaming racing wheels players can find. This is particularly true in the pricey premium range of racing accessories, where Logitech's G Pro wheel has ruled the top-end market for racing sim and motorsport game enthusiasts.

Announced at the company's Logi Play event, the Logitech G Racing Series (RS) promises to build on that dominance by expanding the range of designs and choices available for players to choose from to match their preferences in highly realistic racing games. The new line includes two new Logitech G RS Racing Wheel designs, a Wheel Hub to hold them, and a pair of wheels that more closely match real-world steering wheels designed by partner MOMO. The Logitech G RS lineup is available for pre-order now, and starts shipping on October 13, 2024.

Logitech G RS Racing Wheel Series Includes Partnership With MOMO Design

The new Logitech G RS line consists of the following items:

  • Logitech G RS Wheel Hub - The core hardware that holds the buttons and paddles, as well as connects to the wheel base. - $129.99 (PC/PS) / $149.99 (PC/Xbox)
  • Logitech G RS Round Wheel - A steering wheel attachment that mounts to the RS Wheel Hub and resembles a full racing-style wheel. - $69.99
  • Logitech G RS Track Wheel - A steering wheel attachment for the RS Wheel hub that features only partial grips, mimicking the formula racing style. - $69.99
  • Logitech G RS Shifter & Handbrake - A 2-in-1 sequential shifter and handbrake. On PC it's compatible with the G Hub software for fine-tuning. - $149.99
  • Logitech G RS QR Adapter - A quick release adapter that makes aftermarket steering wheels compatible with any Logitech G Direct Drive wheel base. - $59.99
  • Logitech G Pro DD1 for PC/PS - The wheel base included with the original Logitech G Pro Racing Wheel is now sold separately for players who want to get in starting with the RS series - $599-$699

In a spirit befitting the detailed car customization options in the best racing games, the Logitech G RS line is also further expanded by the MOMO x Logitech G partnership. MOMO is a Milan-based automotive design company best known for making real-world steering wheels. The line includes the SIM GT 320 and SIM GT-Racer 290, two wheels similar to the default Round and Track wheels, but which also include MOMO branding and other characteristic flourishes. The MOMO-designed wheels will launch in January 2025.

With the Logitech G RS series almost ready for deployment, players on console and PC will have some new hardware to look forward to. PlayStation gamers in particular might even consider picking up the hardware to go with Gran Turismo 7 , which may benefit from graphical upgrades coming with the PS5 Pro in November 2024.

item.title: Xbox Game Pass Adds Sequel to Highly Rated, Award-Winning Game
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Wargroove 2 has been added to Xbox Game Pass for Ultimate and PC members on September 19.
  • The turn-based tactics game was inspired by titles like Advance Wars and features charming pixel art and deep gameplay.
  • Wargroove 2 offers local and online co-op, a single-player campaign, and a roguelike mode.

Another interesting game has been added to the Xbox Game Pass library, giving players the chance to try out Wargroove 2 by Chucklefish and Robotality. September has already been exciting for Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscribers, with five day-one titles coming to the service in the first half of the month. Wargroove 2 , which launched on PC and Switch in October 2023, will be making its Xbox debut on September 19 for Ultimate and PC Game Pass members.

Wargroove and Wargroove 2 are turn-based tactics games inspired by Advance Wars , the 2001 Game Boy Advance classic . Developer Chucklefish said about the first game that the goal was to bring the “simple yet deep” and accessible gameplay of that series to modern platforms. In that vein, both Wargroove games are also delivered in a charming pixel art wrapping that doubles down on those Advance Wars vibes.

Wargroove 2 will be added to Xbox Game Pass for PC, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X/S on September 19. After the recent changes to Xbox Game Pass, only Ultimate and PC Game Pass subscribers will be able to play it on the service when it launches, at least for now. It’s still unclear how long a day-one game will remain inaccessible to Standard tier members.

Titles Confirmed for Xbox Game Pass in September 2024

Star Trucker

Available now

Console, PC

Age of Mythology: Retold

Available now

Console, PC, Cloud

Expeditions: A MudRunner Game

Available now

Console, PC

Riders Republic

Available now

Console, PC

Train Sim World 5

Available now

Console, PC, Cloud

Wargroove 2/td>

Available now

Console, PC, Cloud

Frostpunk 2

September 20

PC

Ara: History Untold

September 24

PC

Set a few years after the first game, Wargroove 2 takes players to the shores of Aurania. A new faction of scholarly rodents called the Faahri have come exploring and unearthed ancient relics whose forbidden technologies could lead to catastrophe. But they’re on a mission of discovery and won’t let anything stand in their way, and so the tactical battling begins.

Chucklefish’s Wargroove 2 offers local and online co-op for up to four players, as well as a single-player campaign mode. The game also introduces Conquest, a roguelike single-player mode that dishes up bite-sized battles, and the in-game editor allows for the creation of custom rules, maps, cutscenes, and campaigns that can be shared with the community.

Xbox Game Pass has so far confirmed two more titles coming to the service in September. Frostpunk 2 , the sequel to 2018’s award-winning city-building survival game, will be added on September 20. And Oxide Games’ Ara: History Untold , another turn-based strategy game, will become available on September 24. Both of these games will be arriving day one on Xbox Game Pass and will therefore only be accessible to Ultimate and PC Game Pass subscribers.
